Good Comments: Great video quality, translation seems to be on the mark, timing/typesetting, etc. all good.  The only negative I can think of would be that the font size is a bit too small.  Other than that, quality release.
Found a few mistakes with consistency with the words they use, but good quality 720p at a very low file size, and good karaoke
Great subs, althought some misspellings are imminent
Bad Comments: Almost unreadable styles, awkward subtitle phrasing that detracts from the overall experience.
